thread.section_title: Rome Times Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel with good transport links and easy walking to most sights.
thread.title_full: Hotel with good transport links and easy walking to most sights. - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Anne M
title: Hotel with good transport links and easy walking to most sights.
text: My sister and I have just returned from a four night stay in the Times Hotel. It is central for transport links, within several minutes walk of most of the sights of Rome. Several good restaurants or fast food outlets nearby. Breakfasts are excellent, menu for light snacks or light meal not extensive and could be classed as rather expensive but food and service excellent. Would highly recommend it to friends and family.
